fr.irit.smac.amak.ui

Class DrawableUI<T extends Amas<? extends Environment>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.irit.smac.amak.ui.DrawableUI<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The AMAS the drawableui is linked to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Schedulable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreadTest.AgentPhaseDrawer
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class DrawableUI<T extends Amas<? extends Environment>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schedulable
    This class should be overridden by classes aiming at rendering stuffs on a canvas
    Author:
    Alexandre Perles
